text: 14.117 This policy should be read in conjunction with policy DV3 on healthy communities, which provides further details around what is required of an applicant to ensure the needs of vulnerable groups have been understood and secured through the planning process. The early initiation of a Health Impact Assessment and community engagement will support the applicant in achieving inclusive design outcomes. PEOPLE, PLACES AND SPACES Tower Hamlets Local Plan 191 PEOPLE, PLACES AND SPACES Policy PS6 Heritage and the historic environment 1. Proposals must conserve or, where appropriate, enhance the borough’s designated heritage assets in a manner appropriate to their significance. 2.
